lead_paragraph: Montoya won on the streets of St. Petersburg, Fla., for the second consecutive year to continue the Team Penske dominance at the season-opening IndyCar race.

headline.main: Juan Pablo Montoya Wins Season-Opening IndyCar Race

snippet: Montoya won on the streets of St. Petersburg, Fla., for the second consecutive year to continue the Team Penske dominance at the season-opening IndyCar race.
abstract: Juan Pablo Montoya wins season-opening IndyCar race in St Petersburg, Fla.
